ygData.subject: HALO and EYE are BOTH conjuation
ygData.msgSnippet: OK HALO of LIGHT and EYE of ZOOM are both CONJURATION GAME OVER!  I only fizzle on conjuation spells usually and I just looked BOTH are conjuration . . . Dex
ygData.messageBody:
OK HALO of LIGHT and EYE of ZOOM are both CONJURATION GAME OVER! I only
fizzle on conjuation spells usually and I just looked BOTH are conjuration .
. .

Dex helps your chance "to hit"...


>
> > Eye of Zoom is conjuration? I tought it was divination... I'm not
> > aware of any conjuration spell for Wizards.
>
> Both Eye of Zomm and Halo of Light are Conjuration,although I have a
> feeling the latter one also checks against Divination.
>
>
> ANSWER
> ---------------
>
> No, eye of zom is conjuration that s right but halo of light is divination
> (as sense magic). A question for all of you guys :
>
>
> Do you know what s the purpose of the dexterity ?? I get a cape ac 8 plus
5
> in dexterity.. And i don t see any change for ac or for sepl. Any idea ?
> A second question : you just said eye of zom can open door cool : is it
> working for door like in befallen ????
>
> thanks
>
>
> yakos
